name: Disturb:Conspiracy
description:
[Download all the zip files and extract as one "2022DisturbChapter1" in the same folder,and then play (ignore the extract fault warning)] (Around 7gb)

The virus leaked in one of the bases from Shawn's boss's company, inside Republic Lamkur,

His misson was to collect a creature sample called "Bio-young" for the company,and his another purpose was to look for his lost wife in this underground facility,as he went deeper,more things and truth were showing up...

"It's like a upgrade to my first game Dajiumajia,but the story put to somewhere else.You just need to escape all monsters and feel the story"

"Different levels and monsters inside"

The scenes are dark,and you will have the night vision to see in the dark.And this is a low-poly game.

Press Q to use Night Vision

Press Shift to Run

W/S/A/D for the basic movement

Press F to interact with the elevators

Press E to Intereact the doors,ect

Press V or / to zoom in/out camera

Press P to Load Pause Menu To Save Game

Music: Mostly were EBM,Industrial music,featuring Elegant Form, Human Vault, Hammerschlag, Chem, 2 Bullet,  2Libras, Devoted BJ, diagnosis :autopsychosis, Peter Smit, STAHLSCHLAG, ect.

You can help me making more games by donating me if you like:

https://paypal.me/arealkollen

If you have problem on camera issue with pausing,you can press P to load paused screen and turn press P again to turn off,the camera issue will be gone
